com.vectorprint.report.itext

Interface ElementProducer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ImageLoader, LayerManager
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DatamappingProcessor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDatamappingProcessor, BaseReportGenerator, DefaultElementProducer

    public interface ElementProducer
extends ImageLoader, LayerManager
    implementers should provide at least these methods for adding parts to a report.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl
